scripts.fetch-nova: node scripts/ftp-nova.js && unzip -d tmp -o tmp/nova.zip novaan.xml
scripts.convert-base: JVM_ARGS=-Xmx4G mkdir -p target && java -jar tmp/lib/carml-cli.jar -i tmp/novaan.xml -m config/nova-base.ttl -of nt -o target/nova-base.nt
scripts.convert-rtm: JVM_ARGS=-Xmx4G mkdir -p target && java -jar tmp/lib/carml-cli.jar -i tmp/novaan.xml -m config/nova-rtm.ttl -of nt -o target/nova-rtm.nt
scripts.convert-pricing: JVM_ARGS=-Xmx4G mkdir -p target && java -jar tmp/lib/carml-cli.jar -i tmp/novaan.xml -m config/nova-pricing.ttl -of nt -o target/nova-pricing.nt
scripts.convert-debug: JVM_ARGS=-Xmx4G mkdir -p target && java -jar tmp/lib/carml-cli.jar -i tmp/novaan.xml -m config/nova-debug.ttl -of nt -o target/nova-debug.nt
scripts.convert-zones: JVM_ARGS=-Xmx4G mkdir -p target && java -jar tmp/lib/carml-cli.jar -i tmp/novaan.xml -m config/nova-zones.ttl -of nt -o target/nova-zones.nt
scripts.tdb-load: tdbloader --loc=target/tdb --graph=http://example.org/nova input/schema.ttl target/void.ttl target/nova-base.nt target/nova-rtm.nt target/nova-pricing.nt target/nova-zones.nt
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean fetch-nova fetch-carml convert-nova convert-pricing convert-zones void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump validate-riot
scripts.build-local: npm-run-all clean convert-base convert-rtm convert-pricing convert-zones void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump validate-riot
